title: A Door in the Floor: A Rhyming Story for Kids
itunes:author: Rhea Pechter
itunes:summary:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting [THIS LINK](https://amzn.to/3RRovO5). I hope you LOVE IT!
The first LSFTP PICTURE BOOK is on its way! Take a moment to sign up for the email newsletter at www.littlestoriestinypeople.com for updates and to have your child’s name included in the special illustration in the back of the book (yay)!!
A Door in the Floor is a mystery story for kids! It’s all about the power of imagination and children’s love of make-believe…and cheese.
Make sure you are subscribed to the podcast so you never miss an episode! And please show your support by leaving a rating/review wherever you listen to the show.
I love to hear from my fans! I’d like to start sharing more of your anecdotes, so please email me (rhea@littlestoriestinypeople.com) with your stories and photos of how the podcast fits into your child’s life
You can also find the LSFTP page on Facebook, and find me on Instagram @littlestoriestinypeople.
Please take a moment to share LSFTP with a friends, your local parents’ organization, or your favorite Facebook group!
Also: SHHHH! Don’t tell the TINY PEOPLE. I have a confession to make. The little animals I give special thanks to at the end of each episode…well, they aren’t real. Shocking, I know. They are actually named after fans of the show! If you’d like to hear a “special thanks” given to an animal named after your child, email me at rhea@littlestoriestinypeople.com
And find the new Kids Listen mobile app in the App Store! The app has so many high-quality podcasts in various genres for children of all ages. Check it out!
Sounds used in today’s episode:
    “Hammering Nails, Close”, A .wav by InspectorJ of Freesound.org, https://freesound.org/s/406048/
“Manual Floor Sanding”, A .wav by PhilllChabbb of Freesound.org, https://freesound.org/s/249576/

“Distant Circular Saw” A .wav by kolczok of Freesound.org, https://freesound.org/s/198988/

“Rubber Hammer” A .wav by 13FPsanka_Tolar_David of Freesound.org, https://freesound.org/s/378698/

“1101 Clomping Boots_C.wav” A .wav by pushkin of Freesound.org, https://freesound.org/s/149948/

“Drill.wav” A .wav by LuannWepener of Freesound.org, https://freesound.org/s/326102/

LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting THIS LINK. I hope you LOVE IT!

The first LSFTP PICTURE BOOK is on its way! Take a moment to sign up for the email newsletter at www.littlestoriestinypeople.com for updates and to have your child’s name included in the special illustration in the back of the book (yay)!!

A Door in the Floor is a mystery story for kids! It’s all about the power of imagination and children’s love of make-believe…and cheese.

Make sure you are subscribed to the podcast so you never miss an episode! And please show your support by leaving a rating/review wherever you listen to the show.

I love to hear from my fans! I’d like to start sharing more of your anecdotes, so please email me (rhea@littlestoriestinypeople.com) with your stories and photos of how the podcast fits into your child’s life

You can also find the LSFTP page on Facebook, and find me on Instagram @littlestoriestinypeople.

Please take a moment to share LSFTP with a friends, your local parents’ organization, or your favorite Facebook group!

Also: SHHHH! Don’t tell the TINY PEOPLE. I have a confession to make. The little animals I give special thanks to at the end of each episode…well, they aren’t real. Shocking, I know. They are actually named after fans of the show! If you’d like to hear a “special thanks” given to an animal named after your child, email me at rhea@littlestoriestinypeople.com

And find the new Kids Listen mobile app in the App Store! The app has so many high-quality podcasts in various genres for children of all ages. Check it out!
